modShortDescription: This mod adds snow vehicles to the 7 Days to Die. It includes some skis, snowboard, skateboard, kart, sled/large sled and electric/kick scooter.
modDescription:
This mod adds [snow](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-snow-biome/) vehicles to the 7 Days to Die. It includes some skis, a snowboard, a skateboard, a kart, a sled/large sled, an office chair and a electric/kick-scooter.

* You can craft them in the Workbench using basic resources.
* You can use Left and Right direction to do some rotation in the air/adjust your direction with every vehicle except with sleds.
* Mouse based direction is prefered to use those vehicles. Will upload a version that let you choose to craft a “sport” or a “normal” version of every [vehicle](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-vehicles/) very soon.

**Changelog:**  
\-Added Japanese Version  
\-Added Kart  
\-Fixed yellow error on load  
\-Added Electric Scooter, works with fuel and has a headlight  
\-Fixed scooter sometimes getting stuck in walls

Moongaming recommend using a nitrogen map with smoothest terrain setting if you want to fully enjoy the ski/snowboard.

[Download](https://gitlab.com/oignonchaud/oignonchaud-7d2d-mods-a18/-/archive/master/oignonchaud-7d2d-mods-a18-master.zip?path=Oignon+Vehicles+Pack)  
Japanese Version (translated by Chiko): [Download](https://drive.google.com/open?id=1soPtCTLySB7jdzQpu8hYv6oLNvSWtevr)

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/16555-oignons-vehicle-pack-ski-snowboard-sled-skateboard-etc/).

**Credits:** [Moongaming](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/moongaming/)
